environment.name: PATH
environment.value: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio .NET 2003\Common7\IDE;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio .NET 2003\VC7\bin;d:\tao_builds\taoadmin\DDS\build\vc71_d1o0\bin;d:\tao_builds\taoadmin\doc\ACE_wrappers\build\vc71_d1o0\bin;d:\tao_builds\taoadmin\DDS\build\vc71_d1o0\lib;d:\tao_builds\taoadmin\doc\ACE_wrappers\build\vc71_d1o0\lib;

command.name: file_manipulation
command.options:
type=create file=build/vc71_d1o0/setenv.cmd output='set ACE_ROOT=d:	ao_builds	aoadmin\doc\ACE_wrappers uild\vc71_d1o0
set CIAO_ROOT=d:	ao_builds	aoadmin\doc\ACE_wrappers uild\vc71_d1o0\TAO\CIAO
set CVSROOT=:pserver:taoadmin@cvs.ociweb.com:/cvs
set CVS_RSH=ssh
set DDS_ROOT=d:	ao_builds	aoadmin\DDS uild\vc71_d1o0
set MPC_ROOT=u:\MPC
set PATH=C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio .NET 2003\Common7\IDE;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio .NET 2003\VC7 in;d:	ao_builds	aoadmin\DDS uild\vc71_d1o0 in;d:	ao_builds	aoadmin\doc\ACE_wrappers uild\vc71_d1o0 in;d:	ao_builds	aoadmin\DDS uild\vc71_d1o0\lib;d:	ao_builds	aoadmin\doc\ACE_wrappers uild\vc71_d1o0\lib;%PATH%
set TAO_DCPS_TS_FLAGS= 
set TAO_ROOT=d:	ao_builds	aoadmin\doc\ACE_wrappers uild\vc71_d1o0\TAO
'
